Text:
Install Instruction:

1.Put the folder "PS3" on a USB flash Drive
2. Go to Settings > System Update
3. Choose "Via Storage Device"

***Install Instruction:

1.Put the folder "PS3" on a USB flash Drive"
2. Connect the USB flash drive to your ps3 USB input
3. Go to Settings > System Update
4. Choose "Via Storage Device"***
Warning: Only use on fat PS3's not newer slim ones.
